website_summaries.verdict: This ultra-popular push-car is the perfect pick for parents who want a simple, low-maintenance toy for their child.
pros: Extremely simple and no-nonsense design makes the product especially safe for younger children
Parents enjoy the sturdy feel of the car and in our testing it has high durability
Toy fits older children and even some adults
cons: May damage wood flooring if ridden indoors
A few buyers claim their product arrived with missing parts

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit and didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I thought we had a defective plasma car (bought 5 months ago) so I kept trying to tighten the wheel and work with it. I have seen the real plasmacars and loved them. After reading reviews I saw we were also sent a counterfeit product and I’m highly disappointed in amazon for marketing this as the original plasma car. It’s now too late to return the item so if I want one for my kids to play with I will have to buy again and hope it is truly a real plasma car. Time to buy in store!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a completely flat, smooth surface to work. Doesn't work on sidewalks,streets, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is wobbly does not move on its own unless the ground is totally flat and very smooth (such as a basketball court/gymnasium). We originally tested this product out at a gym and loved it but were sorely disappointed when we purchased it for our home and it doesn't work on the sidewalks, doesn't work in the garage because there is an every so slight slope, and does not work in the driveway. Basically there is NOWHERE that this works other than the gym where my son does gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Our kids (11, 9, 5, and 2 yos) loved it. We used it indoor only on tiles and laminated flooring. The wheels glide very well, and it was easy to turn and maneuver. However, the steering wheel came off its hole last week and neither my hubby nor my self was able to put it back. When my hubby first originally assembled it in Dec 2018, all he had to do is put a bit of pressure and the steering wheel stayed put. For fun that lasted only for 4 months, this product was disappointing and pretty expensive. I wish I could return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Anakasik

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Christmas Return Policy ...Sold me a defective toy!
customer_reviews.text: Steering wheel defective and could not be assembled. Bought early for Christmas and didn’t discover until after 30 day return policy. Company refused to exchange or return, apparently no Christmas return policy in effect like other companies have. Shows they are more concerned about getting their $85.00 and not concerned about my grandson being disappointed! Normally have great service with Amazon vendors but would definitely stay away from Potlatch Creek. I’m stuck with a defective toy...off to the dump to throw the useless thing away. Feel robbed.
customer_reviews.author: MaryM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift. Great fun. Very happy child.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this plasmacar as a gift for my little nephew in Thailand. He was not yet 2 years old. But it became his favorite toy. He is now 2.5 years old and quite good in driving it. It has given him strength, co-ordination, and a sense of growing up. The best investment to date for this sweet little boy.
customer_reviews.author: UWS Manhattan Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy, But We Got A Dud
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend that has a couple of these for kids/grandkids and they are super fun little cars. They're sturdy enough that the kids' parents will ride them around with the kids. It's super neat how the car can move forward and backwards just by turning the steering wheel back and forth. Unfortunately, the car we got was defective - the wheels ground against the plastic and the 20-30 pound toddler couldn't get it to move. So, great car when it's not defective, but when it's defective it's not that fun.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke Lark

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts. I usually research before buying anything and even when a lot of the reviews had missing pieces, I still took a chance and bought it. It did not have the washer and bolt. Amazon sent me a replacement, hopefully I have better luck with that one because I already bought the replacement wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Last Long Sadly
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot of fun for the kids in the beginning but after a few years the wheels got locked up and from what we could tell nothing was trapped so we took them to the dump :( I hate throwing things away instead of being able to pass them on to others.
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: This car is way fun and an instant hit with the kids
customer_reviews.text: This car is way fun and an instant hit with the kids. I'm 6'2, 230 lbs and I can jump on this thing without being concerned it would break. It seems pretty durable, holds up well to daily abuse, and is a fun toy to have in the garage. The kids under 4 I've seen have a hard time with the coordination it takes to operate the "swivel" motion, but it's a short learning curve. Older kids will get it right away, the motion is pretty intuitive. Regardless, this is a fun little buggy to include in your arsenal of outdoor toys and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AgileGuru

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the kids active!
customer_reviews.text: This PlasmaCar is such a fun toy to watch the kids on. Both of my young kids enjoyed riding it and we got to the point of doing some timed races. Watching the kids it must be a good arm workout as they move from side to side and try to go faster and faster, This car works great in our basement with short carpet which allows the kids to use it year round and have so much fun. The seat appears to be very comfortable and the size works great for a large ranges of kids. I have already recommended the PlasmaCar to many of our friends.
customer_reviews.author: P@

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and no manufacturer support
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of experience putting together toys for my children, this seems to be one of the worst designs in secure the handle bar to the steering wheel. The product is unusable and I strongly recommend not buying this product. They do not even include a support number on the manual and the instructions are too vague.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages and sizes
customer_reviews.text: We all love this thing! My husband is 230 and can ride this thing! It's a little slow and his 6'2" long legs look a little silly but it is always guaranteed laughs for all! Only negative is it seems to leave little marks on our vinyl flooring so it became an outdoor toy. Our 21 month old is trying to figure it out now because he sees the rest of us taking turns on it and having a good time. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sass

customer_reviews.title: Better than I realized!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my young boys like to glide down our driveway (it’s on a decline) but my 6 year old figured out that it’s actually made to scoot itself by turning the steering wheel back and forth! It will propel forward! I didn’t realize this was how it’s designed. It’s awesome! My kids love it! It doesn’t work on carpet, but just an FYI. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Holly D W

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product.
customer_reviews.text: The steering wheel pulls right out. There are 3 of them that I know that have the same problem. That happened while my 3 year old grandson was racing down a hill going fast. He did get hurt as he crashed. In spite of buying it months ago, he only rode it 4 times, only at grandma's house. I demand a refund, this is a dangerous product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it so much. He rides it every day when we play outside. My daughter also likes it. It is easily to move forward
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Your 3 year old will love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s cool my son loves it I would of give it five stars if it didn’t come with plastic wheels It would of been cool if it came with the scooter wheels. I upgraded the front wheels with scooter wheels but the rear will need rollerblader wheels cuz of the design on the rear but now it goes faster my son loves it
customer_reviews.author: German Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 to 66 (my age).
customer_reviews.text: This "car" is the best! We got one for each of our grandsons (6 and 3), and they love scooting around on them. Recently we had a big birthday party for the two of them in a local recreation center, and all the kids brought their own wheeled vehicles. Of course, these were a big hit. Interestingly, Grandpa (me) at 215 pounds, had just as much fun scooting around, and the wheels didn't even creak. This is a well-made toy with endless kid appeal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Steen

customer_reviews.title: Best invention in the world
customer_reviews.text: The best invention in the world. My toddlers love this wiggle car and have driven it almost every single day since we bought them. My twins get so tired playing on these which makes me happy cuz their ready for settle down time afterwards. Lol. We even have one at church all the kids wait in line to play with. I've even gotten on it myself and wow it really gets up to a roller coaster speed on just a tiny decline. Very impressive
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Decided to KEEP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay ~ forgive me ~ Ive had a change of heart ~ after having read (somewhere on the questions and answers area of the PlasmaCar), Ive decided to keep the car, the helmet and the polyurethane wheels. I apologize for blowing up on the website and, I plan to let the public know that, I jumped to unnecessary conclusions... So, consequently, I will be giving this to our little great grandson for one of his Christmas gifts. I DO love Amazon and, your customer service has always been impeccable...please forgive me for misjudging before I looked at all the facts.
customer_reviews.author: "Boat Girl!"

customer_reviews.title: Great todo on toy for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this ride on!! They are 6 & 8 and I thought they would be too big, but they aren’t.. this is our second one, so they will each have one. This is an excellent toy for kids 4-10years! My - a star is not for the product itself, but the one we got in the mail had obviously been a return.. it was a bit scuffed, and had a pink ribbon tied around it. I don’t mind so much.. my kids won’t notice and it was just cosmetic stuff.. no biggie. But that’s why I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: OliveT

customer_reviews.title: This car is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The plasma car is awesome. I bought one for my son when he was one and he is still playing with it at 4 years old. I bought the suggested wheels and switched out the stock ones. It makes for a much faster quieter ride indoors and it keeps my floors from being scratched. He is quite the little speed demon on it now. I also always felt safe with him riding it as it doesn't tip over and has a nice wide seat. Even the older neighborhood kids beg to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Porter

customer_reviews.title: Total hit with my kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase...I should have bought 2!! I bought this for Christmas to keep in the basement for my 7 year old boy and my older ones fight over it! My 10 year old who weighs 100 lbs loves it. Even my two teens ride it around. It works great on our unfinished basement concrete floor. I bought it strictly to keep inside the basement and for it to remain clean. It is not recommended for wood floors. They have all different ride on items downstairs, but this is the favorite! I will be getting my daughter one for her birthday. I may even buy an extra one for when other kids come over. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nattie

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: I tried similar one in my sister’s house and loved it. I searched and bought this one which is little more expensive than my sister’s because of more possitive reviews. However I am so disapointed since even on a flat surface and following instructions someone has to push my daughter in order for it to move. Disappointed in this product. Not recommand!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: All my kids love riding this
customer_reviews.text: We had seen this at a specialty toy store, but when my kiddo got birthday money and we saw it (for significantly less) here on Amazon, she was so excited. The instructions were clear *enough* to put together though I did have to take the "steering wheel" off and try again. You'll need a screwdriver or allen wrench (? I think?) to get it tight enough but once it's built it's nice and smooth. Still riding it in the winter in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen W

customer_reviews.title: Handlebar snapped off steering column after a year
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids all loved this however the handlebar snapped off the steering column after a year of very little use. Can’t seem to find a website that has the correct replacement part. Very disappointed. Will be contacting Amazon. Stay tuned... NOTE: I am changing my review from 2 to 4 stars because I was refunded the full amount for this item. I love amazon customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed seeing at this product had so many great reviews
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 3 1/2 received this a Christmas gift and has probably played on this plasmacar a handful of times The steering wheel is extremely flimsy and gets loose. My husband has had to take it apart to tighten steering wheel number times. Disappointed seeing that this product had so many great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Aemard

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ride!
customer_reviews.text: Rides really well. 3 year toddler loves it. Keeps going for a while with only little wiggle every so often. There seem to be many choices of similar product with small difference in price, but this one is certainly worth the buy. I have seen some others that friends have bought, that did not seem to work as great. This toy keeps my son busy for a while!
customer_reviews.author: KNT

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 of these. Was so excited to ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these. Was so excited to give them to my kids for Christmas. Unfortunately both had 1 piece missing (you don't know til u go to put it together. Both now are just setting in a box in my closet. I can't ship back the way it is...once you get handle on it can't be undone and no longer fits in box...also likely cost a lot to return. Just took the loss. :(
customer_reviews.author: Joni Giovaniello

customer_reviews.title: Was great, until the steering wheel wouldn't tighten anymore.
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome for about 3 weeks. It barely moves now. Twisting the steering wheel no longer moves it forward. It's like the steering wheel isnt tight enough anymore. We've used a rubber mallet to try and tighten it as the original instructions state but that doesn't work. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I dont Know where all the good reviews at coming - should be around $20 not $50 goes reallllly slow that’s if you can even get it started without a push - if there the slightest incline your not going anywhere-
customer_reviews.author: GGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Very robust design
customer_reviews.text: Very robust design. We actually played on this with our kids, and it didn’t seem to find full adult weight. I don’t think that’s recommended, but it sure was fun. Our nephew has had this same model for several years, and it is held up really well despite countless hours of use on both paved asphalt and concrete surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: GLo

customer_reviews.title: So fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My littles LOVE their plasma cars!! They ride them every day - in the house, outside, everywhere! My husband and I have even take a turn and they’re very sturdy and fun to ride. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Car
customer_reviews.text: I think this is an awesome car. I bought it for my grand kids, ages 3 1/2 and 5 1/2.. They both took to it right away, especially the older one..My son said he even tried it out....The kids were riding it through the house on the floors. I have not seen them ride outside yet..(.I have not been back to their house since I gave it to them and it was a cold day.)
customer_reviews.author: Tammianne A.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, durable, kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these cars. The addition of polyurethane replacement wheels (separate purchase) makes a big difference. These have been used my many kids over the last few months and have help up well. Even big kids enjoy these. I bought 2 so they could "race" each other. My husband switched out the wheels pretty easily. I am pleased with their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would be cool if it worked- Arrived with not all the right parts
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time, but we bought it a couple months before my son's 3rd birthday. We just put it together 2 weeks ago and it was apparent that the car had previously been opened. The instructions weren't clear, but we put the car together and then realized that the car was missing a piece so that it can't be steered/used. Not impressed with the seller, the car would be super cool if it could be steered and my son was excited but quickly realized it's not functional if you can't "make it go" by steering it. Wish it worked
customer_reviews.author: A.Garcia

customer_reviews.title: HOURS of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loves this! He drives it around the house constantly. The learning curve wasn't long and it doesn't go fast enough to cause injury, so I don't worry about him falling over. I seriously can't tell you how much time they kids have played with this and given me a break. I highly recommend this to any family!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Barber

customer_reviews.title: Six Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best and most used Christmas gift of 2015.Bought it for my granddaughter who turned 3 in May. Loved it. Ended up buying another for grandson who will be 2 in July. Even older sister loves it, she's 11. Deceptively well built.Initially seems like not much for the money but big payback in fun.
customer_reviews.author: Legsananda

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things we've ever gotten
customer_reviews.text: We love this wiggle car. Our grandson loves it and rides it everyday. The only problem we have is that all the kids want to ride it from ages 3-13. May have to buy a 2nd one. Don't hesitate with this one. Was easy to assemble. I did purchase the nicer wheels right up front based on the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: So fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 2 year old but I love to ride it just as much as she does! She was able to figure it out right away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ROI toy & Santa gift
customer_reviews.text: We listened to the reviews and have not been disappointed. Our kids got this for their Santa gift. They probably haven’t stopped riding then since Christmas. Great for 2.5+. NOTE: We’ve only enjoyed this indoors so far. Not sure if it’ll need to be an “outdoor” toy once we let me go outside. But when I think about ROI for toys. This is truly one that hits the mark.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Mama

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Does not propel like I thought it would. Would not purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rickv

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality assurance from the manufacturer in China.
customer_reviews.text: The first car I received didn’t have handle bar with it. Sent it back and received a replacement car. This car had all the parts but the handle bar shaft wouldn’t fit into the bushing! Sent it back and didn’t reorder another car.
customer_reviews.author: dennis k.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the best toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: The plasma car is everyone's favorite toy! My kids are 5 years apart (boy and girl) so it can be a challenge to find toys they both like. We live on a street with a hill so we decided to make ours in indoor toy. The kids ride around and around the first floor. When kids come over to play, the first thing they go to find is the plasma car. We have had ours for 3 years and it's a hit from the 2-year-olds to the preteens! Truthfully, the adults love it too (if they have the inclination to try it)! Bought one for my nephew and it's just as big a hit at his house!
customer_reviews.author: themaven

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids 2-10
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for kids from the time they can sit well solo until they hit the weight limit which is a long time...my son has been riding this like crazy and loves it. It is different than a bike and actually my kids both fit on the seat part. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: strwberryjoy

customer_reviews.title: Parents and grandparents (up to 220 pounds) can ride this.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Purchased it so that this grandmother could play with my grandchildren. The 2 year old loves riding it by scooting with his feet, the 7 year old loves making it go as fast as she can and then taking sharp turns. But, I like it best when they push me. Fun for all of us!
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Mom

customer_reviews.title: Plasma Car
customer_reviews.text: My two boys love this plasma car (I bought two red ones). Sometimes they use it correctly, and sometimes, they just race around the house on it. Haven't used it outside, and probably, never will. My boys are 2 and 3. The 3 year old caught on quickly, but the 2 year old still struggles with it. He will get it soon. And, mommy has also tried it out. Alot of fun. When the 2 year old is sleeping, I use his to race my 3 year old. Tons of entertainment not only for kids, but parents, as well. Would definitely recommend, and I will probably have to get a 3rd, since I also, have a 5 month old son.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: BIG HIT - best birthday present for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Absolute hit - we gifted this to our 2 year old neice and she was zooming around all afternoon on this - along with our son who is almost 4. They took turns driving and giving each other rides - the ability to move without pedals or a motor (just steering) is so impressive and makes for hours of uninterrupted easy fun - even for adults. We're already arguing who is going to get one for our son this Xmas - worth every penny and for the size and quality of the product, actually a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: TMH

customer_reviews.title: My daughter rides this all around the house!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old is having a blast with this Plasma Car. She loves it and keeps her busy during this winter break while I work from home: great investment. I purchased a neutral color for her so when it’s time to pass it on, it’s not an issue 😄
customer_reviews.author: BlueNyobe

customer_reviews.title: Not for all kids
customer_reviews.text: After reading the rave reviews this riding toy recieved, I thought my grandson should have one for his 5th birthday. I have to say we were all disappointed with the results. My grandson was frusterated with wiggling the handle so much, he is very active in sports etc but I guess he needed more 'instant gratification' as he grew bored quickly. It might have helped if the road out front of his house were a bit smoother. It seems that the bumpier the surface, the more difficult the maneuvering to get it to move faster than a slow walk. Sorry, but kids just don't flock to this like other reviews indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Tishtrya

customer_reviews.title: more than expected
customer_reviews.text: Caution this thing is a shoe killer be prepared I bought two of these so my 2 year old could follow his 10 year old sister Worked perfectly At 2 my son pushed his way through the carpet to the kitchen. They both love them.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY C

customer_reviews.title: great for energetic little ones, make sure siblings get one too!
customer_reviews.text: We got one for my sons 2nd birthday, and had to get one for my 5 yr old as well. I'm glad to have read the tip below about getting one of these for each sibling, because all the fun is playing bumper cars! We've had these for a little over 2 months, and they still play with them (alot!) every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good with help from YouTube
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy the plasma car but when it arrived it was in a large amazon box and when you open the delivery box inside you will find the plasma car in pieces in plastic bag taped shut. There was no instructions and just loose parts. Given there is not much to it but there are still instructions on assembly needed to put it together correctly and maybe instruction on how to ride it would be useful. We watched YouTube for assembly and how to operate it.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Happy boys!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for my nephews, ages 5 and 7. They love sipping around the yard and park on these. Ridiculous packing though. Two giant boxes arrived with some bubble wrap in each one. I was able to fit both plasma cars and all the bubble wrap into one box. More unnecessary cardboard to recycle....
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Well made product and the great grands and parents love them.
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe the joy this brought to the great grandchildren at Christmas. Well made and the parents got on them and ride them as well as the little children. We purchased 4 of them and it was a race around the tile floors at our grand daughters home all Christmas evening and continues to this day..
customer_reviews.author: Bijous-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Every child needs one of these. It is so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Grandma and Mom however are like speed racers around the house
customer_reviews.text: Grandma got this for my two year old. She's still too young to use the steering propelling function, but she scoots around on it. Grandma and Mom however are like speed racers around the house. Was this really a gift for the little one?
customer_reviews.author: RamsterTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old grandson for Christmas - he wasn't terribly excited at Christmas, but after he started riding it he really likes it. It is plastic, but very sturdy and well built. Also, it is small enough to ride in the house in bad weather and did not appear to hurt the tile floors at all. Nice to let him expand some energy even when he couldn't get outside to play. It does need a smooth surface, so would be best on a driveway / sidewalk or smooth parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: summer girl

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Very good toy for smaller kids, not so easy for a 2 year old, but great for 3 - 5 or so.
customer_reviews.author: emzacsco

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy riding it in the house which drives me crazy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the kids and yea they work really well on tile floor and flat surface but if you have a textured or cracks on floor it tends to not work. It gets stuck. My youngest rides using her feet to peddle it since it kept getting stuck and upon getting stuck kids will tend to tip over if they are younger. Kids enjoy riding it in the house which drives me crazy. but outside only in limited areas
customer_reviews.author: Simi

customer_reviews.title: My son absolutely loves this PlasmaCar!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this PlasmaCar. He played it at a friend's house and wouldn't get off from the car! So we got it for him and before I could even assemble it, he jumped on it already. haha It's the first thing he plays when he wakes up.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Wong

customer_reviews.title: Not as fun as EzyRoller
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money on an EzyRoller. I bought both for my preschool-age grandkids. They have fun with the PlasmaCar but the EzyRoller is way cooler and way faster. I bought the aftermarket wheels for the PlasmaCar and that boosted its performance a bit. But the price difference between the PlasmaCar plus the better wheels isn't to far from the price of the EzyRoller.
customer_reviews.author: Janx

customer_reviews.title: MY SON CAN'T GET ENOUGH!
customer_reviews.text: I love the plasma car, well my son loves it. I have to chase him all over the world now jogging, LOL. It's great because although he is only 2, he "can" get it to work the way it is intended. But he doesn't get enough speed that way yet, so he pushes off with his feet and loves it. We go blocks and blocks at a fast pace this way, and so far so good. The only tiny complaint is the yellow cap on the steering wheel keeps popping off, but I guess I can crazy glue that. I hope this will last us for years to come as he loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Lerner

customer_reviews.title: Great. Don’t buy a fake.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves this thing. Can get very fast so make sure they wear a helmet!! I was tempted to buy one of the knock offs but saw that durability was an issue so I didn’t. This has held up pretty well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE FRAUD- FAKE FROM CHINA-NOT A PLASMACAR
customer_reviews.text: This is a completely fake item. It is made in China and isn’t a real PlasmaCar. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM. Not only is it cheap plastic and construction (if you can even put it together after 2 hours), but it doesn’t even move forward. This seller is a FRAUD.
customer_reviews.author: stanfordite

customer_reviews.title: kids love this thing
customer_reviews.text: kids love this thing. We have wood floors and the kids have been running it around the house all winter. Now that it is getting nicer they mostly use it outside. great fun for 5-12yrs old. Even a 200lb adult may have some fun on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ernzer Family

customer_reviews.title: My two kids (4.5 and 1.5) LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a Christmas present for our two kiddos, 4 and a half and 1 and a half at the time. One of the best purchases we've made. Super solid construction, and pretty easy to assemble (especially at midnight on Christmas eve). Our oldest got the maneuvering down really quickly and scoots all over, and our youngest has even picked it up as well. They ride it inside on our hardwood floor and it doesn't mark it up ... but taking it outside on concrete or macadam is where it really goes. Great, great gift for kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Walter, CFP

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this is the best present I've ever purchased for my daughter! I bought it for her at 18 months. She rode it in the house all winter (using her feet to scoot along). My husband and I take turns giving her rides on it too. Now that the weather is getting nicer she loves taking it outside and scooting along the road. Eventually she'll learn to power it using the handle but for now it's amazing as is! Will look at buying a second one so the neighbor kids don't fight over it.
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: ALL AWESOME so far, REALLY!  Mean It!
customer_reviews.text: I do BIG presents on birthdays, not holiday, being frugal I purched during the holiday sales to store up. A month after returns were okay (free), I opened the box to find I was short a part- the steering wheel, oh NO! I phoned Amazon. Speaking with an awesome REAL person without going through all the options was amazing right away. More important, the care and efficiency Tanya M assured and brought it home has made a good day great. Can't wait to see my Willie's BIG eyes when we finally do BIRTHDAY. xx
customer_reviews.author: MGStrickl

customer_reviews.title: Bought its a little prematurely for my 20 month old ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought its a little prematurely for my 20 month old but now that she is almost 2 she has figured out how to use it ( doesnt swing the handle side to side but rather uses her feet and pushes against the ground) works for her and she enjoys it a lot. I have tried using it as well and its fun
customer_reviews.author: SomeGuy&Gal

customer_reviews.title: GRANDSON LOVES IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this car for my grandson's birthday and he LOVES IT!! He's only two and doesn't fully understand the concept of not using your feet and just turning the wheel, but he's still enjoying driving around the house "Fred Flintstone" style. I'm sure by springtime he'll get the hang of it and really enjoy it outdoors. If you're thinking about ordering it, don't hesitate--it's very well made (even Grandma took a turn!). I'm going to be ordering two more for Christmas presents for my granddaughters!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my special needs son, he loves it but we had to fix the steering wheel already after a month of minimal use. IDK if it is a flaw in design or a due to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Scam & I never write reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real plasma car. No box and directions/pieces were difficult to assemble. Dissatisfied and disappointed to find that this product did not assemble and we were unable to have this under the tree at Christmas. Return has been initiated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy but my kids do not seem to like it very much because it is hard to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy but my kids do not seem to like it very much because it is hard to use on sidewalks. The toy needs to be played with on a completely flat smooth surface otherwise it does not work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Holds up over time.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun riding toy. We've had one for years and love it. They really last. We bought another one for our daughter who can’t walk. She doesn’t need her legs to make it go. all the kids love it and even big kids can ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, my husband and I have been riding these in the house more than our two kids, but they are so fun! My husband surpassed the weight limit (he's 6'4" 260 lbs) yet it still works for him. We do pretty well on our engineered wood floors, but they have no texture, so we slip a little. We haven't tried them outside due to snow, but they are great on our floors. We have two of the red ones, which are nice and bright. I bought them on a lightening sale, so I feel they were good deals for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Dearest

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 3 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: My son doesn't care to ride a tricycle (too hard to steer & pedal at the same time) so we bought the red car & it's been great. It's perfect for those cautious or a bit slow on the physical development. Provides confidence and ability to ride, even if they do not use it properly. It's great for bigger children & adults too. If you're going up hill it may be tough. Product came quickly in original package. Pretty easy to put together, just need some muscles. Lot's of kids around our community have them. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: KimKen

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my nephew's 7th birthday & he adores ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew's 7th birthday & he adores it. Also, bought one for my niece & she loves hers as well. We may end up purchasing one for outside use only. We keep these cars indoors because we do not want to get gravel & dirt on the wheels and then bring them in again to be ridden on the wood floors because they may scratch. No worries of scratching the wood if the wheels are clean though.
customer_reviews.author: D. SPENCER

customer_reviews.title: 9 years now and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love riding the plasma cars. It has become a favorite with friends coming to play. The kids ride them mostly in our unfinished basement and garage. The smooth concrete floor allows more speed and they zoom around for hours. All of the other ride ons we purchased spent most of their time parked. They give the kids a little engineering lesson. All you have to do is wiggle the handle bars and they way the wheels are placed in the front allow for the inertia to create movement.
customer_reviews.author: Connie She

customer_reviews.title: awkward
customer_reviews.text: None of us could get this to work - even with the suggested new wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these and the kids love them! They are durable and fun. We have bought three more as gifts and receive favorable feedback about them all. The kids ride down the hill with them on the concrete sidewalk, the wheels have held up nicely. We have only had one wheel break (after a year or so of hard play) but it is still operational. I would definitely recommend this to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: J. McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for 3 yo and adults, well built, sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 3 yo grandnephew. He quickly figured out turning wheel side-2-side created propulsion. Loves it because he can ride it indoors around the kitchen island and in the playroom/den which has outdoor carpeting. Did I say adults in my title? You betcha! Temptation got a hold of dad, who is 6'-2" 180lbs, as he boogied around the kitchen too. Quite funny. Well made, easy to put together. This is a toy that kids can grow into for several more years. Well worth buck$. Get one, you'll be very happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Cruzin

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, but not as well made as my old one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these over a year ago and had no problems with it, but this one I got was not as well made. Some of the wheels are stuck. Luckily it is the smaller front wheels which barely ever hit the ground. Other than that they do love riding on them, even though they use their feet to propel them, they don't work well on our paved driveway just using the handlebar thing. So all our shoes are developing holes where they scrape across the ground. The kids all love them though. It is the first fought over riding toy in the daycare..
customer_reviews.author: Corrie the reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Amazon Riding Toy!
customer_reviews.text: We have the previous iteration of the plasma car and with 4 grandkids competing to use it, decided to add another. The plasma car is easy to put together (65 year old Nana had no problem!), and is a favorite outdoor toy for the kids. It does pick up some speed, and one would think there are safety issues in that, but the grandkids (ages, 3,6,6,8) intuitively know when to put down their feet to slow the vehicle. The quality of the toy is great and we have no worries about it breaking and causing injury while they are riding it.
customer_reviews.author: Audilox

customer_reviews.title: This is the best car ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review as my 10 year old son rides his plasma car around and around and around and around the house ... he can not get enough of it. It really powers all by itself and it is very sturdy. He's 10 and he fits perfectly in it. My 12 year old daughter even loves going on it. I highly recommend buying this - I bought it for him for Christmas and out of all of the gifts he got, this was his favorite (besides his skateboard!) I am getting ready to order two for my friend's twins who are turning 7!
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to our home
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a 7 year old child. It was simple to assemble and is quite sturdy. We use the car indoors and the maneuverability is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Wonky Little Toy Car
customer_reviews.text: Having never ridden a PlasmaCar before, assembling this thing was a strange experience. The wheels don't line-up as one would expect and the steering wheel look small and useless. That being said, the fact that this thing can move/glide the way it does with a few turns of the steering wheel is very cool. We need to take it some place with a bigger surface than our driveway, to see what it can really do. Four stars because tipping has been a big problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis & Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as i expected
customer_reviews.text: This toy has been a dud for our family. It really doesn't get much use. I'm hoping that my 3yo are old will grow into it in a few years. The wheels in the front are weird. I'm not sure why they are not always all on the ground. I thought we put it together wrong but it doesn't seem like it. One wheel is never on the ground. The handle always pops out so we have to constantly put it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOY EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, best ride on toy ever and for big kids to small kids. Bought it for my 4 year old son, and he loves riding around the house on it. The plastic wheels have scratched our wood floors, so we are going to start using it on the tile floor in the basement. My 18 month old has also figured it out and comes riding by on it. I bought her a kids ride on for christmas, but think i am gonna get her the pink one soon. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Intuitive Car"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at Amazon's recommendation and what a hit! My 3 1/2 year old granddaughter jumped on and was riding all over my house ( it didn't mark my floors at all). The best was seeing her 15 month old sister and 17 month old cousin either riding in front of her on the car or tooling around on their own. I can't recommend this enough - a great car for the little ones and like nothing else I've ever seen. We have the typical toddler cars that they power with their feet on the floor - this blows them all out of the water!
customer_reviews.author: Meryl Ankori

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the number one fought over toy at my house (with kids 3,5,and 7). They all love it and it gets tons of use every day. It seems to hold up well to the abuse of riding semi-rough surfaces regularly. My kids love to ride it down a little hill by our house and can really cruise. They prefer to do that than use the arm motion to move it. I put them in a helmet but it is very stable and we haven't had much in the way of tipping or accidents on it. I wish I had one for each of them!
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong!
customer_reviews.text: I got this PlasmaCar for my grandson and he LOVES it! Everyone loves it! They all wish I had gotten them one too! Anyone can ride who is 250 LBS and under! I also bought a red and blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Thumbs-Up!!

customer_reviews.title: Fun little car
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren love it...just make sure you spend the extra cash and purchase the better rollerblade wheels, the wheels that come on it are a hard plastic and really hinder the performance of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we’ve bought. This was an open box/warehouse deal, but the plasmacar was in perfect condition and brand new! This one stays at Grandma’s house!
customer_reviews.author: A. Brink

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love these
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these. Even Grandma gets on it and scoots around. Amazing how it maneuvers without power. You do need the extra space though such as a driveway
customer_reviews.author: terrie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT toy for all ages! Bought it for my 2 y/o nephew & both he & his FATHER love riding it! Lol! Burns tons of energy for rambunctious kids! Also helps with upper body motor skill development, it's safe to ride & can be used both indoors, on carpet & outdoors too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L Hendershot

customer_reviews.title: Love this plasma car!
customer_reviews.text: This plasma car is so easy to assemble and great quality. It has been a great toy for the adults and children alike in our home from ages 2-42. Great investment and will buy another one to double the enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for a wide age range
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren love these. I bought two of these for my grandchildren to play on when they visit. I got them last Christmas... The kids never get bored and still ride them every time they visit. Some assembly is required and it takes about 15 minutes. My grand children at 3 years to 10 years old and they all play and ride the PlasmaCars
customer_reviews.author: KLL

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son's 3rd birthday. He loves it. I read others reviews, the child should be three our daughter who is two and can't do it by her self. We ride down hills with them (it does get going really fast I'd just be careful). The only complaint is that my husband had a hard time getting the nut tight enough on the handle. Once he got it it worked great even on carpet for our 3 yr old to do. Would absloutly buy another one and probly will once our other two girls are a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointed... :-(
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with this purchase. Given the high ratings, I bought this for my 3 year old for Christmas. The plasma car move very slowly and tips VERY EASILY. He gets frustrated with it all the time and doesn't even want to use it. I bought a Radio Flyer Ziggle for my 5 year old at the same time and both boys have much more fun with the Ziggle.
customer_reviews.author: Raina Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: My son Loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: my Son loved it!!! easy to put together. pretty sturdy. my son is 7 and very very tall. was surprised this fit him very well... he loves going down the hill in my neighborhood!! Loves it..
customer_reviews.author: Happynewmom

product_meta.title: PlasmaCar The Original by PlaSmart (Red)
product_meta.description:
Color:RedThe sleek, innovative design of The Original PlasmaCar features a patented safety seat, polypropylene wheels, and is kid powered; kid approved! Sit with both feet on the footrests, turn the steering wheel and away you go. Turn and navigate in small spaces indoors, and ride outdoors on sidewalks, pathways, and any other safe, smooth, flat surface. The award-winning PlasmaCar is easy to operate, and helps your child develop coordination, balance, and motor skills while harnessing the natural forces of inertia, centrifugal force, gravity, and friction. PlasmaCar is adult-friendly too: it doesn’t require an expensive power source that needs constant replacement, it provides kids with plenty of exercise, and it is quiet, the only sound you’ll hear is the sound of the wheels. Adult assembly required; instructions included. Please review all warning labels and read instruction manual before using this toy. Fully assembled: 31” x 14” x 16”. Model No. PC020

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
It's like magic, but you don't need to be a magician to get it to work. The PlasmaCar is a mechanical marvel that makes use of that most inexhaustible of energy sources, kid-power, by harnessing the natural forces of inertia, centrifugal force, gravity, and friction. It's so easy to operate; all it needs is a driver and a smooth, flat surface. The PlasmaCar is adult-friendly, too. For starters, it doesn't require an expensive power source that needs constant replacement. No batteries, no power-cells, no liquid fuel-just the occasional cookie or two. It's quiet too-the only sound you'll hear is the sound of its wheels. It provides kids with plenty of exercise, more so than most toys. And the PlasmaCar is engineered to be absolutely safe when used appropriately. It's been extensively tested, and meets or exceeds all significant international safety standards. Fully Assembled: 31" x14" x 16"8.15 lbs Please look at the videos on the catalog for installation.
feature_bullets: NO BATTERIES, GEARS, OR PEDALS, the Original PlasmaCar is kid friendly; kid approved
USE INDOORS OR OUT while reaching exhilarating speeds up to 6 mph / 10 km/hr; ADULT FRIENDLY it supports up to 220 lb / 100 kg on smooth, flat surfaces

A SLEEK DESIGN with a patented safety seat PlasmaCar by PlaSmart is great for children 3 yrs and up, and it’s easy to use – just prop your feet up on the footrests and turn the steering wheel to get moving

ENJOY PEACE OF MIND: PlasmaCar meets and exceeds all US, Canadian, and European safety standards; CPSIA, CCPSA, ASTM, EN71, ISO and ICTI certified. PlaSmart cautions against using PlasmaCars with standard wheels on hardwood floors. PlasmaCar wheels may damage some wooden floors. Please note that the PlasmaCar booklet warns that it is not recommended for use on wooden floors

A MULTIPLE AWARD WINNER including the prestigious Oppenheim Portfolio Platinum Seal Award 2006, and Gold Seal Award 2005, Dr. Toy’s Best Vacation Winner 2005, TDmonthly Top Seller 2007, recipient of the 2016 Totally Awesome Awards Seal, 2005 TNPC Seal of Approval, and 2007 TOTY Nominee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,952 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
